game.name: Save Injured Santa And Christmas Elk
game.description:
Christmas celebration has just hit the homes of human beings! Santa is as excited as his children and started delivering gifts to his children. Oh, but what happened suddenly! His elk has slipped and is dropped down to the ground. Luckily, Elsa was there while collecting gift from Santa and she decided to get him and his Elk cured. Would you like to help Elsa in such a wonderful task? Join Save Injured Santa And Christmas Elk and be prepared to play the role of a doctor and help Santa deliver all his gifts to children!

You have to first cure Santa and then help the Elk to get recovered from his injury in this brand new doctor game. Do not forget then to help the little princess to choose a perfect Christmas style dress. Give Santa a medicine immediately to get him relieved from the intense pain! Then clean the injury with the soft cotton, take the extra of the injured parts like hands and legs, take out all the thorns off his leg and then give the broken parts a needful plaster. 

Once you are done with Santa, get ready to treat the elk by following all the instructions you see on the screen. Give him a capsule first, take out the thorns off his body and then clean the infected parts with the cotton in this html5 girls game! Try to complete this surgery as fast as you can since the pretty girl Elsa is waiting to get a new look! Dress her up with a cool dress and match it up with a nice hairstyle, hair-band, a nice toy in her hand and a pair of matching shoes! Good luck to create the best results in our all kids games that are free to play online, no download required!
